org.corfudb.runtime

Class BootstrapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.BootstrapUtil

  • public class BootstrapUtil
extends Object
    Utility to bootstrap a cluster.

    Created by zlokhandwala on 1/19/18.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • bootstrap

        public static void bootstrap(@NonNull
                             Layout layout,
                             int retries,
                             @NonNull
                             Duration retryDuration)
        Bootstraps the given layout. Attempts to bootstrap each node finite number of times. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        layout - Layout to bootstrap the cluster.
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.

      • bootstrap

        public static void bootstrap(@NonNull
                             Layout layout,
                             @NonNull
                             CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters corfuRuntimeParameters,
                             int retries,
                             @NonNull
                             Duration retryDuration)
        Bootstraps the given layout. Attempts to bootstrap each node finite number of times. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        layout - Layout to bootstrap the cluster.
        corfuRuntimeParameters - CorfuRuntimeParameters can specify security parameters.
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.
